long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Coloron is a fun game where you must pay attention to the color of the ball since the color of the ball changes after every jump.

How to Play:
Click on 'play' to start the game.
Gameplay:
1 Tap = Red
2 Tap = Yellow
3 Tap = Purple

Game features:
1. Speed of the ball increases after scoring more points.
2. In the End of the game you can share score with friends and challenge them.
﻿3. Simple operation but hard to master.

Play more games on the left-bar menu

Install extension
Click the Colorun game icon on the Chrome toolbar
and we will open a Colorun game for you to play the game! You don’t need to do anything else!
And wish you have a good time!

WHAT'S NEW?
